    • Method Detail

      • register

        MonitorRegistration register(java.lang.String identifier,
                             java.lang.String owner,
                             long duration)
                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             MonitorException
        Clients first register with the Monitor service in order provide status. Clients are responsible for maintaining the MonitorRegistration's provided Lease.
        Parameters:
        identifier - An identity or name used to associate the event with.
        owner - The owner, a userid or organization that is producing the event.
        duration - The requested lease duration in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        A new MonitorRegistration if a matching registration for the same identifier and owner is not found.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is a communication failure between the client and the service.
        MonitorException - If the Monitor service is unable or unwilling to grant this registration request.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the identifier or owner arguments are null, or if duration is not positive or Lease.ANY.

      • update

        void update(MonitorRegistration registration,
            Monitor.Status status,
            MethodAnalytics analytics)
     throws java.io.IOException,
            MonitorException
        Update the status of the registration
        Parameters:
        registration - The registration
        status - The status
        analytics - Analytics for the method (operation) being invoked
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is a communication failure between the client and the service.
        MonitorException - If the Monitor service is unable to update the status of the registration. This may be due to expired lease or other error(s).
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the registration or status is null.

      • register

        net.jini.core.event.EventRegistration register(MonitorEventFilter eventFilter,
                                               net.jini.core.event.RemoteEventListener listener,
                                               long duration)
                                        throws java.io.IOException,
                                               MonitorException
        The register method creates a leased EventRegistration for the notification of sorcer.core.monitor.MonitorEvent events that correspond to exertions being monitored for a provided Principal. type passed in based on the requested lease duration. The implied semantics of notification are dependant on org.rioproject.event.EventHandler specializations.
        Parameters:
        eventFilter - The MonitorEventFilter to match the provided MonitorEvents. If null, all MonitorEvents will be matched.
        listener - A RemoteEventListener to ve notified of MonitorEvents that are accepted by the MonitorEventFilter
        duration - Requested EventRegistration lease duration
        Returns:
        An EventRegistration
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the listener parameter is null or the duration is not positive or Lease.ANY.
        MonitorException - if the duration parameter is not accepted, or if the Monitor service is unable or unwilling to grant this registration request.
        java.io.IOException - if communication errors occur

      • getRegisteredIdentifiers

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> getRegisteredIdentifiers()
                                                                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
